kjv_def: + almost, brief(-ly), few, (a) little, + long, a season, short, small, a while
strongs_def: puny (in extent, degree, number, duration or value); especially neuter (adverbially) somewhat
outline:
1. little, small, few
    1. of number: multitude, quantity, or size
    2. of time: short
    3. of degree or intensity: light, slight
